content: Hi everyone! I'm heading out on sabbatical from August through December, woohoo! That means stepping back from all things work-related, which includes Backdrop and normal PMC responsibilities. We've got all that sorted out in terms of PMC stuff, but just wanted to say bye to folks so it doesn't look like I just disappeared out of nowhere! :)
You can read more about Palante's sabbatical policy on our Backdrop site :D https://palantetech.coop/blog/palantes-first-sabbatical
Have a great sabbatical -- great that you get one!

Hello,

No one will ever receive or read this email!

I will be on sabbatical from August through December, returning to work in January 2021. During this time email sent to jack@palantetech.coop will not be delivered to any mailbox.

If you have any questions or would like help from Palante, please get in touch with your other contacts at the coop, email team@palantetech.coop or visit https://palantetech.coop/contact to get in touch that way. If you are an existing client you can also email tickets@palantetech.coop to get support more quickly.

Saludos,
Jack
Hah, I did not imagine that my away message would end up here in Zulip
